titleStmt.title: A sober guess at the issue of our troubles. By certain maximes & conclusions from the general rules of Scripture. : Applied to our particular case. : Published for the publick good, / by A friend to the truth.
titleStmt.author: Friend to the truth.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Allen at the Rising Sunne in Pauls Church-yard,
